segments.text: Can you tell me a little about Paris ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What do you expect to know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to see some of the famous places like Eiffel Tower , the Seine River ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And you shouldn't miss the Louvre Museum . You can stay there for at least a whole day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good idea . I almost forget it.What else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The night life there . It's so romantic !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , wonderful ! How is the weather ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went there in August , and it was hot . But I was told autumn is the best season .
segments.speaker: S2
